title: Rewind
description: ***A Perfect Forever Novella 57 Pages***Kaley Stanton has it all: beauty, brains, and a promising future as an independent documentary filmmaker. What she doesn’t have is the love of her life, Bobby Rowen. A drunken night and a big mistake has Bobby walking out her life.Bobby Rowan has known since high school that Kaley is the only girl for him. Letting her go was the hardest thing he ever had to do, but he was certain it was the only way to truly keep her.Will a chance encounter help these two young lovers rewind their mistakes and finally become a Perfect Forever couple?Kaley is about to find out…
author: Susan  Ward
